org.springframework.data.projection

接口 TargetAware

  • 所有超级接口:
    RawTargetAccess, TargetClassAware

    public interface TargetAware
extends TargetClassAware, RawTargetAccess
    Extension of TargetClassAware to be able to ignore the getter on JSON rendering.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Class<?> getDecoratedClass()
      Re-declaration of Spring Framework 4.3's DecoratingProxy.getDecoratedClass() so that we can exclude it from Jackson serialization.
      Object getTarget()
      Returns the proxy target.
      Class<?> getTargetClass()
      Returns the type of the proxy target.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTargetClass

        @Nullable
Class<?> getTargetClass()
        Returns the type of the proxy target.
        指定者:
        getTargetClass 在接口中 TargetClassAware
        返回:
        can be null.

      • getTarget

        Object getTarget()
        Returns the proxy target.
        返回:
        will never be null.

      • getDecoratedClass

        Class<?> getDecoratedClass()
        Re-declaration of Spring Framework 4.3's DecoratingProxy.getDecoratedClass() so that we can exclude it from Jackson serialization.
        返回:
